update.description:
This PR contains the following new code:

*  state machine
*  tests for the state machine
*  a scheduler
*  support for cloudsim-grant 0.2.0

The scheduler works as follows:

* A function to start and a funciton to stop it
* periodically, simulations are sampled, and split (finished, running, ready and waiting)
* the state machine is driven by this process

Also, the server file has been renamed to cloudsim_sim.js, and the websocket code has been pulled out. This code doesn't need reviewing as much, it is largely the same. Next, the websocket
code is going to move to a module, to allow widgets to respond to resource updates (for any server).
update.title: Sim scheduler

content.raw: that PR is a good idea

I ported some changes from this PR to pull request #14. That's just moving files around. If we merge that first this should be easier to review. 

Feel free to just ignore that PR if it doesn't make sense to have the extra step.
content.html:
I ported some changes from this PR to pull request #14. That's just moving files around. If we merge that first this should be easier to review.

Feel free to just ignore that PR if it doesn't make sense to have the extra step.

content.raw: I noticed that the PUT and DELETE routes for simulations weren't being tested, so I added some tests in a [branch](#!/osrf/cloudsim-sim/branches/compare/sim_scheduler_louise%0Dsim_scheduler#diff). DELETE seems to be working, but PUT is expecting all fields to be present in the request, is that expected?
content.html: I noticed that the PUT and DELETE routes for simulations weren't being tested, so I added some tests in a branch. DELETE seems to be working, but PUT is expecting all fields to be present in the request, is that expected?

content.raw: ping @hugomatic
It's not clear to me what would be running at this point. As far as I understood, there are no tasks in the queue yet, right?
content.html: It's not clear to me what would be running at this point. As far as I understood, there are no tasks in the queue yet, right?

content.raw: Just to confirm, is this going to be addressed in a future PR?
content.html: Just to confirm, is this going to be addressed in a future PR?

content.raw: done
This might require changes to cloudsim-grant. It was decided to address this in a separate PR.
